SageTVPlugin.Name: DVBE4SageEPGImporter - DVBE4Sage EPG Importer Services
SageTVPlugin.Description: This plugin will accept the EPG data parsed from DVBE4Sage and import it to your configured lineup
SageTVPlugin.Author: Jabroni
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
1.0
* First Release. Be sure to have a fully configured DVBE4Sage Instance (which supports EIT Parsing) and point it to your listening Importer port.
